tasks.name: Organize schedule
tasks.description: Organize my schedule to stay on track and avoid falling behind.

tasks.name: Review assignments and projects
tasks.description: Review any assignments or projects that are due soon and allocate time to finish them.

tasks.name: Catch up on messages and emails
tasks.description: Read and respond to pending messages and emails to stay on top of communication.

tasks.name: Take a break
tasks.description: Take a break to clear my mind, grab some food, and reset before continuing work.
